title: COP30 rejects fossil fuel phase-out amid open protests from some countries
description: Resistance from oil-producing nations forced summit to adopt weaker 'voluntary' text, drawing sharp condemnation from Colombian, European delegations

title: COP30 ends with finance boost but no fossil fuel roadmap
description: Brazil, which held the presidency of COP30, pushed the deal through after two weeks of tense and extended negotiations between representatives of more than 190 countries

title: Vuon Chuoi: Tracing 4,000 years of life in ancient Hanoi
description: Vuon Chuoi (Banana Garden), an archaeological site in Hanoi’s Hoai Duc commune discovered in 1969, vividly reflects the continuous habitation of ancient residents on Thang Long – Hanoi land over nearly 4,000 yearsVuon Chuoi reveals Vietnam’s Bronze Age treasures An Giang races to complete UNESCO nomination dossier for Oc Eo-Ba The archaeological siteHanoi posts strong 10-month tourism growth, rolls out plans to sustain momentum

title: World News | COP30 Ends with Finance Boost but No Fossil Fuel Roadmap
description: Get latest articles and stories on World at LatestLY. Brazil, which held the presidency of COP30, pushed the deal through after two weeks of tense and extended negotiations between representatives of more than 190 countries.The United States did not send an official delegation, adding to the diplomatic challenges.

title: 'COP Of Adaptation': Amid First-Ever US Absence, UN Climate Summit Ends With Fossil Fuel Stalemate
description: COP30 failed to agree on a global roadmap to transition away from fossil fuels and end deforestation despite over 80 countries supporting the call at the annual UN summit
